scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,CLIENT,INTERNAL -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:internal"
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && npx tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.build:local:
npm run build && echo '
✅ Build complete! Start API server and run: npm run serve:local'
scripts.start: concurrently -n API,CLIENT,INTERNAL -c blue,green,magenta "npm run start:api" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:internal"
scripts.serve:local: echo '⚠️  Make sure API is running (npm run dev:api)' && concurrently -n CLIENT,INTERNAL -c green,magenta "npm run serve:client" "npm run serve:internal"
